meanings.definition: To treat or combine with cyanoethylate.
meanings.sent1: I will cyanoethylate the fabric to make it more durable.
meanings.sent2: The chemist decided to cyanoethylate the solution for better results.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that he would cyanoethylate the recipe to give it an extra kick.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed seemed to cyanoethylate every aspect of her life.
meanings.sent5: The artist's passion seemed to cyanoethylate every stroke of the brush.

meanings.definition: A compound formed by the reaction of cyanoethyl alcohol with another substance.
meanings.sent1: The laboratory displayed various cyanoethylates for research purposes.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the properties of the cyanoethylate under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The collection of cyanoethylates on the shelf looked like a rainbow of chemicals.
meanings.sent4: The cyanoethylate acted as a bridge between the two different compounds.
meanings.sent5: The unique smell of the cyanoethylate lingered in the air of the lab.
